EmailTemplate.name: HH Newsletter
EmailTemplate.subject: Live Different Build Newsletter - February 2006
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.FirstName},
Thank you for your interest in Live Different Build 2006. The application deadline is drawing near, but there is still time to get your application in. We would love to see you in the Dominican Republic this summer!
To read our full newsletter please copy and paste this link into the address bar of your browser: www.absoluteontheweb.com/heroholiday/Newsletter/february06.htm
If you would like more information about Live Different Build please visit our website www.heroholiday.com or contact us at info@heroholiday.com .
We look forward to hearing from you!
Sincerely,
Everyone from Live Different Build 2006 and Absolute Leadership Development
